level.text: A respondent may be subject to one or more of the following penalties and costs:
A penalty equal to the amount of the fine, if a respondent fails to answer an NOI within fifteen (15) days from the date of service;
A penalty equal to twice the amount of the fine, if a respondent fails to answer a second NOI within fifteen (15) days from the date of service;
An inspection fee of fifty dollars ($50) for all reinspections and reinvestigations conducted by the Director in connection with an infraction;
A hearing fee of forty dollars ($40), if the respondent is found fully liable for an infraction;
A witness fee of thirty-one dollars and fifty cents ($31.50) for each witness subpoenaed on behalf of the respondent; and
A fee of one percent (1%) per month of the outstanding amount owed by a respondent for the installment service.
Interest on the amount to be paid under a final order shall accrue at the rate of one and one-half percent (1.5%) per month, or a prorated portion, from the date of a final order or default.
